name: Easy A LOONEY_TUNES Quiz | Words in Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only letters in "LOONEYTUNES", find a 5-letter word meaning baggy, as in 'not tight'.
questions.explanation:
Loose.

	If something is loose, like clothing, it is baggy.  The opposite of loose is tight.  Also, if an animal escapes from its cage at the zoo, it is said to be "on the loose".

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word meaning 12:00 in the middle of the day, using only letters in "LOONEYTUNES".
questions.explanation:
Noon.

	If it is 12:00 in the middle of the day, it is said to be noon.  If it is 12:00 in the middle of the night, it is called midnight.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LOONEYTUNES", find a 4-letter word that is the type of word that describes a person, place, or thing.
questions.explanation:
Noun.

	A word that describes a person, place, or thing is called a noun.  Man, bathroom, and shampoo are all nouns.

questions.text: Find a 3-letter word, using only letters in "LOONEYTUNES", that is a thing that you play with.
questions.explanation:
Toy.

	A toy is something you play with.  It can be a baby toy, like a rattle, or a toy car, a toy train set, a Barbie, or a stuffed animal.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LOONEYTUNES", find a 4-letter word for what pecans and almonds are.
questions.explanation:
Nuts.

	Pecans and almonds are both types of nuts.  Peanuts, cashews, and walnuts are also types of nuts.  A nut can also be a silly or crazy person.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LOONEYTUNES", find a 4-letter word that generally describes a wrench, hammer, or saw.
questions.explanation:
Tool.

	A tool is something that you use to build or fix things.  There are all sorts of tools, like a wrench, hammer, saw, screwdriver, and even a chisel.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LOONEYTUNES", find a 4-letter word for your sight organs.
questions.explanation:
Eyes.

	Most people have two eyes which help them see.  They can be blue, or brown, or red, or green, or black, or gray, etc.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LOONEYTUNES", find a 3-letter word for a peg used in golf.
questions.explanation:
Tee.

	A golf tee is a little peg that can be put in the ground, and it has an indent on top so a golf ball can sit there.  This lifts the golf ball off of the ground, and makes it easier to hit a long distance.  Tees can come in all different colors.  A tee can also be a word that means a T-shirt.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LOONEYTUNES", find a 4-letter word that means a snout.
questions.explanation:
Nose.

	"Snout" and "nose" both mean the same thing, and they can both be found in "LOONEYTUNES"!  A nose is the thing in the middle of your face, below your eyes and above your mouth.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LOONEYTUNES", find a 4-letter word for a musical sound, or a short message.
questions.explanation:
Note.

	A musical sound that can be played on an instrument is called a note.  Notes can be high or low, loud or quiet, and fast or slow.  If someone leaves a short message on the fridge for you to see, it is called a note.
